author: RSalvatico
body:
#### PR description:

Several Phase2 HLT modules using the `PFECALSuperClusterProducer` are taking as input the `EcalRecHitsEE` as barrelRecHits and `EcalRecHitsEB` as endcapRecHits. These are not used in the building of the mustache supercluster, which is the only supercluster algorithm used online at the moment, also for Phase2. Nevertheless, this is still a nasty bug and could cause problems in the future - they are in fact used for example for the DNN supercluster in [PFECALSuperClusterAlgo](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/631818abebaf8c4665619acbadc8ebd9e8a9d80e/RecoEcal/EgammaClusterAlgos/src/PFECALSuperClusterAlgo.cc#L142-L144).

I have not found offline modules with the same issue - I think they are all created by the fillDescription of the [PFECALSuperClusterProducer](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/631818abebaf8c4665619acbadc8ebd9e8a9d80e/RecoEcal/EgammaClusterProducers/src/PFECALSuperClusterProducer.cc#L383-L384), which is correct.

On the other hand, note that the modules `hltParticleFlowSuperClusterECALL1Seeded` and `hltParticleFlowSuperClusterECALUnseeded` in ConfDB present the same issue and should be fixed as well.

#### PR validation:

As explained above, I would not expect to see differences.
title: Fix mismatch between EB and EE recHits in Phase2 supercluster producer configs
